Similar trends of comorbidities were observed in an analysis of 355 patients who died of COVID-19 in Italy, with pre-existing HTN, DM, CAD, atrial fibrillation, and cerebrovascular disease recorded in 76%, 35.5%, 30%, 24.5%, and 9.6%, respectively.
